p: To detect the tissue distribution of B/2017 and B/2017-MA viruses, on days 3 and 6 p.i., three mice were sacrificed, and organ samples of lungs, brain, heart, liver, kidneys, and spleen were harvested in 1 mL of PBS. Samples were then homogenized and centrifuged, and viral titers in the homogenized supernatants were determined by the Kerber method with Ashmarinâ€“Vorobyov modification. To assess by light and electron microscopy pathological lesions in mice infected with B/2017 or B/2017-MA viruses, their lungs were harvested at the 3rd and 6th d.p.i.
